fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 rose 2.85 points or 0.01% to settle at 19,396.45. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 1.77% to 11.75. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
